Title: Intention vs Instinct
Description:
Cave borers are not social creatures as a rule. Seeing this many gather in one place speaks to intention.

A wormcaller of the nerubians must be present.

Find them and recover the tool they use to call these worms here. With it we can lead them away in time.
ObjectivesText: Collect a Singing Stone from Wormcaller Iz'tikrine.
